text: P47 or P-47 may refer to: * Papyrus 47 or P47, an early copy of the New Testament in Greek * Republic P-47 Thunderbolt, an American World War II fighter aircraft * , a Second World War Royal Navy submarine transferred to the Royal Netherlands Navy before completion and renamed HNLMS Dolfijn * P47, a Latvian state regional road - see List of National Roads in Latvia * P-47, ADC ID for Hutchinson Air Force Station, a United States Air Force station closed in 1968
title: P47
